channel.title: MangoOG Audio Interface
channel.description: Hello All, I am planning to use MangoOH Yellow board for my application. Application would run on application processor of WB7702. Can the application access audio PCM interface to read/write from/to mic and speaker. Does Legato linus support ALSA or any other API for this purpose ?

item.title: MangoOG Audio Interface
item.dc:creator: raghavasanikam
item.description:
Thank you. I have posted my further question on that topic. Could you please clarify on that

Read full topic

item.title: MangoOG Audio Interface
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
You can see here

MangOH Red audio not working WP7702 mangOH Red
@FransKanters, So the WP77 builds are specifically data only builds from a Qualcomm perspective. I do not know explicitly if it affects the non voice call related functions of the device but I expect it would do hence the failure of the API calls. Regards Matt

Read full topic
